0100001001001101 0111000011110100 1 -> sum: 1011001101000010, cout: 0
1010001110111011 1101110001000100 1 -> sum: 1000000000000000, cout: 1

1010111010011000 0000001110011010 0 -> sum: 1011001000110010, cout: 0
